snippet.title: Trailer Ooga Booga: Troubles in Time (English) - Banensoft
snippet.description:
*2D PIXELATED ACTION PLATFORMER & SIDE-SCROLLER*

Looking for a new 2D platformer with retro-inspired pixelated graphics? 🕹️

Want this nostalgia-exuding game to feature simple controls and unique stories?

Meet *Ooga Booga: Troubles In Time*, a side-scrolling 2D platform adventure filled with action, a thrilling storyline, and exquisite platformer gameplay.

Choose your character and travel through different universes to defeat the forces of evil, the enemy is waiting to beat you up!

*Download now for hours of pure mobile gaming joy.*
*Google Play:* https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.banensoft.oogabooga
*Steam:* https://store.steampowered.com/app/2841610/Ooga_Booga_Troubles_in_Time/

*RUN AND JUMP 2D PLATFORM ADVENTURE GAME*

🏃 Dive into a pixelated world filled with captivating stories, intense action, and endless adventure. Start your journey through a vibrant 8-bit universe, where every pixel tells a story. With simple controls to run, jump, and fight, players of all ages can easily dive into the action-packed platformer arcade gameplay.

*MEDIEVAL FANTASY WORLD FILLED WITH SURPRISES*

🏰 Leap over treacherous obstacles, dodge deadly traps, and navigate through intricate levels to progress in your quest. But beware! Along the way, you'll encounter a diverse array of friendly strangers, stories, but also enemies lurking in different scenarios and worlds. From menacing monsters to cunning adversaries, each foe presents a new challenge to overcome.

*CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTERS AND UPGRADE*

🔝 Choose from multiple characters, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles, to tackle the adventure your way. As you progress, collect fruits on the way, unlock powerful upgrades and powerups to enhance your abilities and new characters, and unleash devastating attacks on your enemies.

*Ooga Booga GAME FEATURES:*
- 2D platform game with stories.
- 8-bit pixel graphics.
- 70+ levels.
- 3 lives for each level.
- Simple controller to run, jump, and fight.
- Jump over obstacles to pass the level.
- Choose your destiny.
- Fight against a multitude of enemies in different scenarios and worlds.
- Multiple characters to choose from.
- Unlock powerups.
- Travel to other worlds.
- More than 70 levels.

Go beyond the realms of your imagination as you travel to other worlds, each with its own distinct theme and challenges. Escape from the rolling stone down the hill. Ride the pig and dodge the thugs. Talk to the characters to defeat the final boss.

👉 *Download and play Ooga Booga: Troubles In Time for free and enjoy one of the best platform games of 2024*
